data.decision: Duro business model v2: Trust features (provenance, audit, inspect) before cloud sync. Team pricing at $39. First priority is "moment of wow" demo.
data.rationale: GTM feedback revealed cloud sync is a trap (not what companies pay for), trust converts (managers buy control/audit), and moat is workflow habits not data model. Need emotional hook demo to stand out.
alternatives: Original model: cloud sync as first paid feature at $29 Team
